QuestData.Title: Severed Communications
QuestData.Description: We've had a contact embedded in Magisters' Terrace gathering intelligence for us for some time now, but we've lost contact with him.$b$bThe information he was collecting is vital to our mission.
QuestData.LogDescription: Exarch Larethor inside the Magisters' Terrace wants you to find Tyrith, a blood elf spy.
QuestData.RewardText: ...Come closer, $r... Listen carefully to my words....
